sourcesContent:
<template>
	<el-container>
		<!-- 头部区域 -->
		<el-header>Header<el-button type="info" @click = "logout()">退出</el-button></el-header>
		<el-container>
			<el-aside width="200px">Aside</el-aside>
			<el-main>Main</el-main>
		</el-container>
	</el-container>
</template>

<script>
	export default{
		methods: {
			logout() {
				window.sessionStorage.clear();
				this.$router.push("/login");
			}
		}
	};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
</style>
